mapper.select: select b.bno, b.roomNo, stayDate, a.id, to_char(stayDate, 'yyyy') as year, to_char(stayDate, 'mm') as month, to_char(stayDate, 'dd') as day from booked a, booking b order by bno desc
mapper.insert: insert into booked (bno, id, roomNo, startDate, stay, people) values (booked_seq.nextval, #{id }, #{roomNo }, #{startDate }, #{stay }, #{people })
insert into booking (roomNo, bno, stayDate, bookingNo) values (#{roomNo }, #{bno }, #{stayDate }, booking_seq.nextval)
mapper.select: select roomNo from room order by roomNo asc
